author: gennai
body:
#### PR description:

This PR adds the possibility to upload a new payload only every n LS (and for any LS < n !)
The new default is n = 5, i.e. we produce a payload every 5 LS
#### PR validation:

I have run a modified version of the unitTest to test the intended behavior.
title: From cmssw 12 2 0 pre2
